text:
@IlhanMN [image description]

Screenshot of a news headline, written by Emily Jacobs. The original headline reads "'Squad' members want to make illegal immigrants eligible for coronavirus aid". The words 'illegal immigrants' are crossed out and replaced with 'American taxpayers' in red.
